wikipedia_page.main: Rudy Sternberg, Baron Plurenden (17 April 1917 – 5 January 1978) was an Jewish-British industrialist and farmer.

response: After the surprise defeat of Harold Wilson's Labour government in the 1970 general election, Shepherd worked for Rudy Sternberg's Sterling Group.
